data.title: Let's explore Quezon Memorial Circle
data.meta_description: The Quezon Memorial Circle is a national park and popular landmark in Quezon City. Spacious, Clean and nice place. You will definitely love coming here because there are so many things to do here. The Quezon Memorial CIrcle is free to visit.
data.text:
Quezon Memorial Circle

Quezon Memorial Circle is located at Quezon Memorial Circle Elliptical Rd Underpass, Diliman, Quezon City.

The Quezon Memorail Circle is a large elliptical park and national shrine in Quezon City, Metro Manila Philippines. The park is not only intended to be a memorial, but also a space for creation, education and culture. Today, the Quezon Memorial Circle remains a popular spot for locals and tourists alike. It is a place for families to picnic, joggers to exercise, and couples to enjoy romantic walks. The Quezon Memorial Circle is a 64-hectare national park and famous landmark in Quezon City.

The park offers a wide range of attractions and activities for visitors to enjoy. Let’s explore the top things to do in Quezon Memorial Circle, including enjoying the rides at the Circle of Joy amusement park, visiting iconic Quezom Memorial Shrine, Try various sports and fitness activities and visit the National Garden Botanical.

The park also hosts many events throughout the year, from concerts and festivals to cultural exhibits and educational programs.

There are also many food stalls that sell food here so you have a lot of food choices, some laso sell toys for children.

The park is accessible by public transportation including buses, jeepneys, night buses, taxis and grab.

Quezon City Memorial Circle is a 64-hectare national park and popular landmark in Quezon City, Metro Manila Philippines.

Quezon Memorial Shrine

is one of the most important features of the Quezon Memorial Circle. It is located in the middle of the park with a height of 66 meters. Exploring the Quezon Memorial Circle shrine from Galleria 1 to Galleria 5 allows you to better understand the history, culture and development of the Philippines, This is a great opportunity to expand your knowledge and love of the country.

Gallery 1– Here you can see exhibits about the life and legacy of former President Manuel L. Quezon. He was the main leader of the Philippines during the commonwealth era. Here you will find pictures, personal belongings, and other artifact depicting hid life and accomplishments.

Gallery 2– You will see exhibits that show traditional Filipino histories and activities. One can find here wooden products, textiles and other materials used in the traditional industries of the Philippines.

Gallery 3– You will see exhibits that shows the arts, culture of natives and indigenous groups in the Philippines. Here you will find traditional costumes, art, music, and other aspects of their culture that show their progress and importance in society.

Gallery 4– You will see exhibits about the history of the Philippines from the tme of the Spaniards to the Era of colonialism and the search for independence. You will find pictures, documents and other artifacts that show important events and personalities in the country’s history.

Gallery 5– You will see exhibits that show the modern Philippines. It can also be seen the achievements and ongoing projects in the field of science, technology, art and other aspects of country’s development.

Picnic Place and Ride Bike

Quezon Memorial Circle offers a wide open space for bike lane and picnic, playground/ You can bring a picnic set-up for those who want to have a picnic at the selected picnic spot, but there is also a designated picnic area in the park.

If you want to explore the park by bike, There are bike rental shops here. Just go to the bike station around Quezon Memorial Circle.

How much bike rent in Quezon Memorial Circle?

Circle of Joy and Circle of Fun

Circle of Joy– will feature other children playground such as slides, swingm seesaw and more. It’s free so anyone can comeand kids will definitely enjoy it. There are also many sellers of toys here. Around the playground there are manyfood stalls where you can buy so you don’t have to woory if you don’t have food with you.

Cicle of Fun– The Amusement park features a variety of rides and attractions that cater to diffirent age groups. It has a colorful atmosphere, The rides here have different prices. The park is open daily from 10:00AM-08:00PM.

These are the other rides that can be ridden at Circle of Fun.

Prices of rides at Circle of Fun

Other activities that can be done inside the Quezon Memorial Circle.

Tennis– The park has severl tennis courts that can be rented for use, can be played single or doubles.

Fitness zone– The park has a fitness zone near the playgrounds. It offers outdoor gym equipments such as pull-up bars, weighs and resistance machine. Visitors can exrcise here with fresh air and enjoy the vast environment.

Zipline– Offers visitors a thrilling ride from one end of the park to the other. Here you can see a beautiful view.

Basketball– Players can play or rent courts for a private game.

Nationa Botanical Garden– has 16 hectare of gardens that have diverse collection of trees and plants. It has more than 1,000 plant species. You will surely like to go around here because of the many types of palnts and trees that you can see.

The Amphitheater– This is where events in Quezon City are held, Some artists give concerts here every Christmas and New year.

Review in QUezon Memorial Circle

Location: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Atmosphere: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

That’s all. I hope you can visit the Quezon Memorial Circle. It will definitely be worth you visit becasue of many things to do.
